LanguageData.IntentionalProselytism.CertaintyReduceFa: The certainty loss factor when the selected ideo of the convertee is different from the converter.
LanguageData.IntentionalProselytism.UnlockVFEMIndoctr: Make it possible to select ideo outside the colony for indoctrination pod. (DO NOT CHANGE THIS OPTION WHILE ANY POD IS RUNNING!)
LanguageData.IntentionalProselytism.DisableInterColon: Disable proselytizing between colonists with different ideologies. Does not apply on slave/prisoner/pawns from other factions.
LanguageData.IntentionalProselytism.DisableProselytin: This pawn cannot be proselyted. (Only apply to daily interaction, ability/ritual will work as vanilla)
